what is power bi: Power BI is a business analytics service by Microsoft that provides interactive visualizations and business intelligence capabilities with an interface simple enough for end users to create their own reports and dashboards.
features: Power BI offers data connectivity, data transformation, interactive dashboards, AI-powered insights, and seamless integration with Microsoft 365 and other services.
pricing: Power BI offers a free version, Power BI Pro (paid per user), and Power BI Premium (for enterprise needs). Visit the Pricing section for details.
security: Power BI includes built-in security features such as data encryption, role-based access, and compliance with major standards.
dashboard: A Power BI dashboard is a single-page, often called a canvas, that uses visualizations to tell a story with your data.
data sources: Power BI can connect to hundreds of data sources including Excel, SQL Server, Azure, web APIs, and more.
ai: Power BI uses AI to help you find insights in your data, including natural language queries, image recognition, and automated machine learning.
how to get started: You can get started with Power BI by signing up for a free account or starting a trial of Power BI Pro.
contact: You can contact Microsoft sales or support through the links provided on the website.
